name: Minesweeper - Classic & Hexagon
description:
Play classic (square) minesweeper or play on a hexagonal board. Has Beginner, Intermediate & Expert modes.

Totally free. No in-app purchases.

Click the grid to reveal clues to where sea mines are located. The gird will reveal the number of mines adjacent to any square in the grid. Through deductive reasoning determine the locations of all the sea mines.

Sea Mine icon designed by Luke Anthony Firth from the Noun Project
